::KitKat::

She pulled Destructor aside and whispered to him,"I want you to get 
us all some drinks. and arm yourself with a tranquilizer gun, but 
hide it on you.  If things get dicey, I will order you to dart them.  
ONe they are out cold, they will be dropped off at thier base 
unharmed. I am asking you to do this, I will explain later."  She 
then returned to Cyber Claw and smiled,"Would you like something to 
drink?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor understood. He did not know what was going on comletely 
but he 
> trusted her. And he would stand by her as long as he needed to. He 
walked 
> with her to the new bot and awaited a conversation.
